message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product for $10000. While we can't guarantee the quality of every item, our records show that approximately one-third of our products are high-quality. If you choose to purchase this product, please be aware that it might not meet your expectations. However, if you're willing to take a chance, we believe you'll find value in it.
I'd like to decline the current product. I'd like to know more about the product's quality and your sales record before making a decision.
